subject: Any news on Order #SSN3651?
description_text:
Hi,

Any update on my order? A week has passed and still no news from you guys.

Hope all is well!

Please let me know how everything is going with order #SSN3651.

Kind regards, 
Victor

conversations.body_text: Hi Victor Nygren,   We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the logistics delay. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with restocking expected to be completed by the 28th. At that time, we will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fees.
